title: CAES Space Systems becomes Frontgrade Technologies
summary: CAES Space Systems, a supplier of radiation-hardened electronics, rebranded as Frontgrade Technologies Jan. 10 after being sold to private equity firm Veritas Capital.

title: Full steam ahead for NOAA’s $20 billion GeoXO program
summary: The $19.6 billion budget for the GeoXO program, approved in December, covers six satellites, operations and support extending from 2022 to 2052.

title: airBaltic will equip its fleet with Starlink
summary: Latvian airline, airBaltic, announced plans to equip its entire Airbus A220-300 fleet with Starlink internet and give passengers complimentary access to the...

title: Geospatial industry investor Keith Masback joins board of directors of Cognitive Space
summary: Cognitive Space announced Jan. 10 the appointment of Keith Masback as an independent board member.

title: NASA to Host Media Update on Space Station Plans, Soyuz Status
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference at 9 a.m. EST Wednesday, Jan. 11, to discuss results from the investigation of the Roscosmos Soyuz MS-22 external coolant leak and the forward strategy for uninterrupted human operations aboard the International Space Station.
